name: DarkBASIC Professional Project File
summary: Project file created by DarkBASIC Professional, a free IDE used for developing 3D Windows games; saved in a plain text format and contains references to .DBA source code files for the project as well as other project assets, such as 3D models, textures, and other graphics; can be compiled into an .EXE game executable.
